svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Dl9eBa3sSgKKSGozYmwO-60" value="<div>&nbsp; &nbsp;auto wanderStrategy = new GenericAnimationStrategy(testAnimal-&gt;getAnimPrefix() + "_wander", 4, 0.15f);</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;testAnimal-&gt;setAnimationStrategy(wanderStrategy);</div><div><br></div><div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;auto chaseStrategy = new GenericAnimationStrategy(testAnimal-&gt;getAnimPrefix() + "_chase", 6, 0.08f);</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;testAnimal-&gt;setAnimationStrategy(chaseStrategy);</div></div>" as="points"> <mxPoint x="-440" y="444" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Dl9eBa3sSgKKSGozYmwO-66" value="<div>&nbsp; &nbsp;currentAnimation.reset(strategy);</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp;
